column5: Has anyone stayed here or have any experience on Monument Bay? Thanks in advance for any reply Mudpuppy

I have stopped in to visit a couple of times this year. Danny Gibbons and Sherry haven't been around as the owners from Chicago are now running it. They need to do a lot of work on it but the cabins have some character and are nice. The meals they serve are great and the location is amazing. It all depends on what you want, if your going to fish hard every day its great but if you want to enjoy the resort no.
